word:
"Then answered I, and said unto Him, What are these two olive trees upon the right side of the candlestick and 
                                                                           594
upon the left side thereof? And I answered again, and said unto Him, What be these two olive branches which through the two golden pipes empty the golden oil out of themselves? . . . Then said He, These are the two anointed ones, that stand by the Lord of the whole earth." Zechariah 4:1-6, 11-14.
